69 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
70 template< class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/23
71 void CBaseEmbed<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::_initialize()
72 {
73  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::MeshVertexIterator viter( m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); viter ++)
74  {
75  CVertex * v = *viter;
76  v->huv() = CPoint2( 0, 0);
77  v->touched() = false;
78  }
79 
80  CFace * root_face = NULL;
81 
82  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::MeshFaceIterator fiter( m_pMesh ); !fiter.end(); fiter ++ )
83  {
84  CFace * f = *fiter;
85  f->touched() = false;
86  root_face = f;
87  }
88 
89  _embed_first_face( root_face );
90  root_face->touched() = true;
91 
92  CHalfEdge * he = m_pMesh->faceMostCcwHalfEdge( root_face );
93  do{
94  CHalfEdge * sh = m_pMesh->halfedgeSym( he );
95  if( sh != NULL )
96  {
97  CFace * df = m_pMesh->halfedgeFace( sh );
98  m_queue.push( df );
99  df->touched() = true;
100  }
101  he = m_pMesh->faceNextCcwHalfEdge( he );
102  }while ( he != m_pMesh->faceMostCcwHalfEdge( root_face ) );
103 
104  };
105 
106 
107 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
108 template< class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/23
109 void CBaseEmbed<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::_embed()
110 {
111 
112  _initialize();
113 
114  int count = 0;
115 
116  while( !m_queue.empty() )
117  {
118  CFace * head = m_queue.front();
119  m_queue.pop();
120  assert( head->touched() );
121 
122  CHalfEdge * he = m_pMesh->faceMostCcwHalfEdge( head );
123  do{
124  CHalfEdge * sh = m_pMesh->halfedgeSym( he );
125  if( sh != NULL )
126  {
127  CFace * df = m_pMesh->halfedgeFace( sh );
128  if( !df->touched() )
129  {
130  m_queue.push( df );
131  df->touched() = true;
132  }
133  }
134  he = m_pMesh->halfedgeNext( he );
135  }while( he != m_pMesh->faceMostCcwHalfEdge( head ) );
136 
137  _embed_face( head );
138  }
139 
140  //normalize the uv coordinates
141 
142  double u_min, u_max, v_min, v_max;
143  u_min = v_min = 1e30;
144  u_max = v_max = -1e30;
145 
146 
147  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::MeshVertexIterator viter( m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); viter++ )
148  {
149  CVertex * pV = *viter;
150  CPoint2 uv = pV->huv();
151  double u_param = uv[0];
152  double v_param = uv[1];
153  if( u_min>u_param )
154  u_min = u_param;
155  if( u_max<u_param )
156  u_max = u_param;
157  if( v_min>v_param )
158  v_min = v_param;
159  if( v_max<v_param )
160  v_max = v_param;
161  }
162 
163  double range = ( u_max-u_min )>( v_max-v_min ) ? u_max-u_min : v_max-v_min;
164 
165  printf( "range = %lf\n", range );
166 
167  if( range>1e-6 ) {
168  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::MeshVertexIterator viter( m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); viter++ )
169  {
170  CVertex * pV = *viter;
171  pV->u() -= log( range );
172  CPoint2 uv = pV->huv();
173  double u_param = uv[0];
174  double v_param = uv[1];
175  uv[0] = (u_param - u_min)/range;
176  uv[1] = (v_param - v_min)/range;
177  pV->huv() = uv;
178  }
179  }
180 };
181 
182 }
